overview: Lost among strangers, a sensitive princess, a famous writer and an unwelcome devil try to find their place in an unfamiliar world.  With his accessible and willingly facetious music, French composer GÃ©rard Pesson has created an operatic adventure through three fairy tales. Their marvels are treated with fantasy and delicacy by librettist and director David Lescot.
title: Trois Contes - Pesson
